title: Bug 6009 - New class wizard doesn't get context right for nested classes
OB: When using the new class wizard in build 20011106, with a .java file open in the editor, clicking the new class button does not populate the 'Enclosing Type' field. It remains blank.
EB: The 'Enclosing Type' field in the new class wizard should default to the current type in the editor when a .java file is open.
SR:
To reproduce this issue: 
1. Open a .java file in the editor.
2. Click the new class button.
3. Check the 'Enclosing Type' field.
